title: GETIT™ Yellow Pages
content:
Help!!!

I need help identifying two fonts.

1) GETIT

2) Yellow Pages

Even something close? Help.

[http://wap.getit.in/wapui/fp/getit/getit.svc](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202201932/http:/wap.getit.in/wapui/fp/getit/getit.svc "http://wap.getit.in/wapui/fp/getit/getit.svc")

 [‹ A.T.A. struts its stuff, 1965](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202201932/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36963 "Go to previous forum topic") [Frutiger on the road? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202201932/http:/www.typophile.com/node/13089 "Go to next forum topic")
author: merz

comments.content: You posted your request in the right place initially - the Type ID board. No need to post it here as well. If you didn’t get any responses it’s because nobody can ID the font. GETIT might be custom and your sample is too small to nail down Yellow Pages.
